alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Clearfield; Elk; Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 12:29PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ELK...CENTRAL CLEARFIELD...WESTERN CENTRE...WESTERN LYCOMING...POTTER... NORTHEASTERN BLAIR...EASTERN CAMERON...WESTERN TIOGA AND NORTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM EST... At 1228 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Wellsville to 20 miles east of St. Marys to 15 miles west of Tyrone. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 40 and 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clearfield, Cameron, Wharton, Keating, Philipsburg, Woodland, Coudersport, Bald Eagle, Elkland, Hyde, Renovo, Galeton, Osceola Mills, Westfield, Plymptonville, Chester Hill, Karthaus, Genesee, Houtzdale and Snow Shoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
